attributes.action: change the law so that vat on fuel (petrol and deisel) used in vehicles supplied to disabled under the mobility scheme be refundable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a car that is funded by the mobility scheme and it is more often than not a pretty ornament outside the house because I cannot afford the rising petrol prices. What is the point of having such schemes when fuel is so costly?
